title: for 10 dollard
body:
i buy a card of riot points n i try to have my code but when i scratch the card it take of the code ...
so i ask can i have a refund or can u send me the points on my acount

replies.body: No worries, our billing team should be able to help with this!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help you directly with claiming the card.
Only if you can prove with reciept and the bar code or other numbers riot might need to verify you with. That's a maybe, though.
its ok i dont need a refund i just take n other on .. thks for the answer
